update PO_LINE
PO_HEADER_ID = #{poHeaderId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ITEM_ID = #{itemId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
UOM_CODE = #{uomCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PACKAGE_QUANTITY = #{packageQuantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MIN_QUANTITY = #{minQuantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
QUANTITY = #{quantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER = OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER + 1,
REQUEST_ID = #{requestId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PROGRAM_ID = #{programId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATION_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_UPDATED_BY = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN = #{lastUpdateLogin,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ATTRIBUTE_CATEGORY = #{attributeCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE1 = #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE2 = #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE3 = #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE4 = #{attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

UNIT_PRICE = #{unitPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where PO_LINE_ID = #{poLineId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update PO_LINE set PO_HEADER_ID = #{poHeaderId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ITEM_ID = #{itemId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, UOM_CODE = #{uomCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PACKAGE_QUANTITY = #{packageQuantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MIN_QUANTITY = #{minQuantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, QUANTITY = #{quantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER = OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER + 1, REQUEST_ID = #{requestId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PROGRAM_ID = #{programId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATION_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_UPDATED_BY = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN = #{lastUpdateLogin,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ATTRIBUTE_CATEGORY = #{attributeCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE1 = #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE2 = #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE3 = #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE4 = #{attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE5 = #{attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE6 = #{attribute6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE7 = #{attribute7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE8 = #{attribute8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE9 = #{attribute9,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE10 = #{attribute10,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE11 = #{attribute11,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE12 = #{attribute12,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE13 = #{attribute13,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE14 = #{attribute14,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE15 = #{attribute15,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNIT_PRICE = #{unitPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PO_LINE_ID = #{poLineId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
select , iib.item_name, iib.item_number, iuom.name unit_name from PO_LINE pl left outer join inv_item_b iib on(pl.ITEM_ID = iib.ITEM_ID) left outer join INV_UNIT_OF_MEASURE_B iuom on(pl.UOM_CODE = iuom.UOM_CODE)
PO_HEADER_ID = #{poHeaderId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
